title: Effect of Mediterranean diet on body mass index and fatigue severity in patients with multiple sclerosis: A systematic review and meta-analysis of clinical trials
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Amir Reza Moravejolahkami, Mehdi Shakibaei, Manoj Sharma, Masoud Mohammadnezhad, Sri Lakshmi Sravani Devarakonda
